sources.snippet_or_excerpt: Crypto market remains under sustained bearish pressure as weak demand and low confidence dominate price action into year-end.
A hoped-for breakout year in 2025 failed to materialize as the October crypto crash dragged down the already struggling corner of the alts...
Bears have a firm grip on the leading GameFi tokens, with the majority of them in the red.
Bitcoin bulls are putting up a fight on Friday to break this week's choppy action that has capped all advances at around $90000.
BitFuFu Inc. is deeply undervalued versus peers, trading at a forward EV/Sales of 1.23x. Click here to read why FUFU stock is a Buy.

hypothesis_content.title: BTC Volatility Compression Breakout with Volume Confirmation
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC experiences a period of low volatility (Bollinger Band width < 0.05) within a NEUTRAL regime, a breakout above the 20-period upper Bollinger Band on 4-hour close with volume > 1.5x 20-period average will lead to a directional move of at least 3% in the breakout direction within 48 hours.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Neutral regimes often feature range-bound price action with volatility compression. Breakouts from tight ranges with volume confirmation signal institutional participation and potential regime shift initiation.
entry_conditions: BTC 4H Bollinger Band width (20,2) < 0.05 for at least 5 consecutive periods
BTC closes above upper Bollinger Band (20,2) on 4H timeframe
Volume on breakout candle > 1.5x 20-period average volume

exit_conditions.take_profit: 3% price move from entry in breakout direction
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Close back inside Bollinger Bands (below upper band for long)
exit_conditions.time_exit: 48 hours after entry if neither TP nor SL hit

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Breakout fails to sustain > 3% move within 48 hours more than 55% of occurrences, or false breakouts (immediate rejection) occur > 40% of time.
